title: The Impact of Root Distributions Parameters on ET of SUMMA Model in Aspen stand at Reynolds Mountain East
author: Choi, Young-Don
abstract: This SUMMA Model instance is a part of the Clark et al., (2015b) study, and explored the sensitivity of different root distribution exponents (0.25, 0.5, 1.0). The sensitivity of evapotranspiration to the distribution of roots, which dictates the capability of plants to access water.
subject: Evapotranspiration
pySUMMA
Root Distribution
SUMMA
